meanings.definition: A type of aromatic hydrocarbon compound.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied different benzoles in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Benzoles are commonly used in the production of plastics.
meanings.sent3: The benzoles at the party were the most aromatic!
meanings.sent4: Her love for benzoles was as strong as their scent.
meanings.sent5: The benzoles shimmered under the sunlight, emitting a pleasant smell.

meanings.sent1: We need to buy more benzoles for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The store sells various benzoles for different purposes.
meanings.sent3: The benzoles on the shelf looked like a colorful collection.
meanings.sent4: His collection of benzoles was the envy of all collectors.
meanings.sent5: The benzoles in the container rattled as he carried them home.
